bot: Shlok Salunke is a B.Tech student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at SVKM's NMIMS University, expected to graduate in 2027. He is proficient in Python, C++, and data structures, with experience in web scraping, data visualization, and object-oriented programming. Shlok has completed several certifications, including AI Fundamentals, Cisco Data Analytics Essentials, and Web Scraping Basics. He has also participated in projects such as a Bakery Management System and a British Airways Data Science Job Simulation. Shlok is a quick learner, passionate about programming and data-driven problem-solving, and aims to gain practical experience through internships at dynamic startups.
